text:
Find a comfortable position, either sitting or lying down, allowing your body to fully relax into the support beneath you. Close your eyes gently, and begin by taking a deep breath in, feeling your chest and belly expand fully. Hold the breath for a moment... and exhale slowly, releasing all tension and worries from your body. Let's begin our meditation on Temperance.

Imagine yourself standing at the edge of a serene lake, the water reflecting the colors of the sky above. The air around you is calm and soothing, carrying with it a sense of peace and tranquility. As you breathe in this peaceful atmosphere, feel a gentle breeze caressing your skin, bringing a sense of balance and harmony to your being.

...... Inhale deeply, drawing in the essence of balance and moderation. Feel it filling every cell of your body, aligning your mind, body, and spirit in perfect harmony. ...... Exhale slowly, releasing any tension or discord you may be holding within you.

Visualize the Temperance card before you, depicting an angel gracefully pouring water between two cups, symbolizing the perfect balance and flow of energies. As you gaze upon this image, allow yourself to embody the qualities of patience and purpose that it represents.

...... Take a moment to reflect on the areas of your life where you can bring more balance and moderation. Embrace the power of patience as you trust in the divine timing of the universe. Find clarity in your purpose and allow it to guide your actions with intention and mindfulness.

Repeat after me: "I am in perfect balance, aligning with the flow of life. I embrace moderation and patience in all that I do. My purpose is clear, and I move forward with intention."

...... Stay in this moment of stillness and reflection, feeling the energy of Temperance flowing through you, bringing a deep sense of calm and clarity. Allow yourself to be fully present in this moment, appreciating the beauty of balance and harmony within and around you.

When you are ready, gently bring your awareness back to the sensation of your breath, slowly returning to the space you are in. Wiggle your fingers and toes, and when you feel ready, open your eyes, carrying the essence of Temperance with you as you continue your day.

May you walk the path of balance and moderation with grace and purpose.
